author: pdobacz
content:
There is a proposal to significantly reduce the scope of change related to the introduction of EIP-7873 (TXCREATE) to EOF and Osaka, which is planned for eof-devnet-1. In a nutshell it makes the Creator Contract predeploy not needed to bootstrap EOF contracts. (EIP-7698 would still be _removed_ from EOF/Osaka.)

https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/9593

Please provide any feedback you may have.
